markdown: {{Stub}} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [quest](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsBeastOfWinter/) in {{bow}}. ## Synopsis [Nyvardir](/harbingerNyvardir/), the self-appointed brewmaster of Harbingers' Watch, asked my help in perfecting his recipe for [rymsjódda](/rymsjoddaLager/), a lager prized by pale elves for the fortification it provides against chills. Nyvardir believes that a simple addition could make his beer even more effective at staving off the cold. ## Walkthrough Possible rewards: * [Finality's Claim](/finalitysClaim/) * 4000 coins * 8000 coins with Diplomacy 14 * [Finality's Claim](/finalitysClaim/) and 4000 coins with a Diplomacy 16 If you give him the antifreeze fluid he will promptly mix it in his brew and serve it to another Harbinger, killing him. If you destroy the fluid after getting a reward he and all the NPC in [Harbingers' Watch](/harbingersWatch/) will turn hostile, ingluding [Vatnir](/vatnir/), if he is in your party. ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/LAX02_01_Iceberg_Dungeon/LAX02_tsk_libations_for_a_death_god.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Toasting the Dead''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Nyvardir, the self-appointed brewmaster of Harbingers' Watch, asked my help in perfecting his recipe for rymsjódda, a lager prized by pale elves for the fortification it provides against chills. Nyvardir believes that a simple addition could make his beer even more effective at staving off the cold. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Harvest fluid from rime constructs.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Rime constructs contain a fluid that prevents them from freezing solid at low temperatures. Believing that it will have a similar effect on kith who imbibe it, Nyvardir requested as much rime construct fluid as I could find. Rime constructs have been seen deep within the Dead Floe. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''3''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Nyvardir with the fluid.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10003 | I've harvested some of the fluid Nyvardir asked for, but it seems extraordinarily dangerous to drink. Still, he seemed eager to get as much of the liquid as I could find. |- ! colspan="3" | Unused strings |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''-''' | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 2 | Bring the fluid back to Harbinger Nyvardir |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | I am unsure if this weird substance is what the brew master wanted me to collect. I should take a closer look at it. |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I gave Nyvardir the fluid he asked for, choosing to let him discover its toxicity on his own. |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30001 | I gave Nyvardir the fluid he asked for, warning him of its toxicity. |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30002 | I refused to give Nyvardir the rime construct fluid. |}
